protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the first reaction in the catabolism of the essential branched chain amino acids leucine, isoleucine, and valine. May also function as a transporter of branched chain alpha-keto acids.

go_class.description: cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
branched chain family amino acid metabolic process
